## TextElement.textReservesSpace property

If `true`<!-- -->, `TextElement` will reserve screen space, other markers of lower priority will not be able to overlap.

 `true`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get textReservesSpace(): boolean;

set textReservesSpace(reserveSpace: boolean);
```
